segments.text: This scene in the kitchen tugs at my heart a little.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on drying that single plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's missing the water overflowing from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating a sad puddle on the floor, soaking everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress might get wet, and she won't even know.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool looks so determined to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the stool's tipping, and it breaks my heart thinking of a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's waiting eagerly, like it's the best moment ever.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet the secrecy of it all feels a bit lonely, without mom's help.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window frames a beautiful garden, full of life outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, though, it's like no one's really connecting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the woman would turn and see her kids' adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR
